select.if: SELECT id, `name`, parent_id, url, icon, `order` FROM jrbac_menu ORDER BY `order` ASC

SELECT m.* FROM jrbac_login_user lu,jrbac_role r,jrbac_user_role ur ,jrbac_menu m,jrbac_role_menu rm WHERE lu.id = ur.user_id AND r.id = ur.role_id AND r.id = rm.role_id AND m.id = rm.menu_id AND lu.id=#{user.id} GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.`order`

mapper.select: SELECT id,`name`,parent_id,url,icon,`order` FROM jrbac_menu WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT jm.id,jm.`name`,parent_id,url,icon,`order` FROM jrbac_menu jm,jrbac_role jr, jrbac_role_menu jrm WHERE jm.id = jrm.menu_id AND jr.id = jrm.role_id AND jr.id = #{roleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE jrbac_menu SET `name`=#{menu.name}, parent_id=#{menu.parentId}, url=#{menu.url}, icon=#{menu.icon}, `order`=#{menu.order} WHERE id=#{menu.id}
